name: Out of Controll: A Visual Novel
name_original: Out of Controll: A Visual Novel
description:
Hello! Here's a horror based visual novel. There is only one good ending, best of luck!

Artist: Luureii Design: Kawachi

This game is full of firsts for us!
First time writing a horror scenario, first time doing a game without a programmer and first time making a 2D game, so constructive criticism is appreciated! Also forgive us the spelling mistakes
